title: Katie Holmes goes for high drama as she rocks puffy white shirt while out in NYC
text:
She's been flashing her uber cool style ever since her breakup from Jamie Foxx over the summer.

And Katie Holmes has continued her fashionable ways all the way into fall, seen wearing a ultra feminine white blouse for a Saturday outing.

The 40-year-old beauty added a smile to her dial and strutted through the streets of New York City solo.

Scroll down for video

Style queen: Katie Holmes rocked a white statement puffy shirt on Saturday during an outing in New York City by herself

Katie's rocked a white skivvy for some extra warmth underneath the cotton shirt.

She teamed the look with a pair of high-waisted mom jeans that were distressed in the knees.

The Dawson's Creek alum styled the look with pointed toe boots and carried a large bag along with her.
